mapper.select: select student.* from student where u_id=#{u_id} and s_ispay ='未缴费';
SELECT DISTINCT users.u_id,users.u_name FROM `student` INNER join users on student.u_id=users.u_id where student.s_createUser=#{s_createUser}
mapper.update: update push set isreader=2 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id from push ORDER BY id desc limit 1

mapper.select: SELECT users.u_id,users.u_name FROM users INNER JOIN userroles On userroles.u_id = users.u_id INNER JOIN roles on roles.r_id=userroles.r_id where roles.r_id=10
SELECT users.* FROM student INNER JOIN users ON student.u_id = users.u_id where student.s_id =#{s_id}
